member.name: T:Windows.Win32.Graphics.Direct3D11.D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION
member.summary:
The D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION identifies the type of resource being used.
D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_UNKNOWN Resource is of unknown type.
D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_BUFFER Resource is a buffer.
D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_TEXTURE1D Resource is a 1D texture.
D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D Resource is a 2D texture.
D3D11_RESOURCE_DIMENSION_TEXTURE3D Resource is a 3D texture.
